result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody M. Hinze was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cody M. Hinze is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Cody M. Hinze was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Provide DNA sample.  Undergo any counseling/treatment per agent.  AODA/treatment per agent.
Defendant may apply for expungment if law abiding & fine paid in full. Upon successful completion of probation, record may be expunged, 973.015.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Cody M. Hinze in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Defendant Cody M. Hinze in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states agreement.  Atty O'Rourke agrees and waives prelim.  DE agrees to prelim waiver.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause and binds over.   Atty O'Rourke acknowledges rec. information/waives reading.  NC plea entered to Ct 2.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  

Ct 1:  Dismissed
Ct 2:  NC
Probation for 3 years
Conditions of probation:
$518.00 costs/surcharges to be paid per agent during term of probation
DNA sample to be provided
AODA/Treatment/Counseling/Evaluations per agent
If successful on probation the matter is to be expunged per 973.015
Probation and Parole will be in touch w/DE as he's in custody
Attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke in court.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Reset to tomorrow.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 9, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 06-12-2015 09:15 am.
Return date at 06-24-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Cody M. Hinze by video from LEC with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Cody M. Hinze in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests cash bond.  Atty Middleton responds.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $350.00 cash bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 12, 2015 at 09:15 am.  Return date scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
Defendant Cody M. Hinze not in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant
